summary: SummaryHighlightsCruelty FreeVeganSustainable PackagingGet totally touchable style with DevaCurl's STYLING CREAM Touchable Moisturizing Definer. This rich cream, with a hydra-definition blend, provides medium to coarse curls with shape, frizz control, and a no-crunch finish.
details: DetailsBenefitsGives medium to coarse curls ultimate curl flexibilityMaintains moisture, hydrates & smoothes curlsEncourages curl shape & definitionTames frizzNon-flaking, non-stiff & non-crunchyFeaturesHydra-definition blend enhances curl body and shape, maintains shine, encourages curl clumping, improves manageability and combability & minimizes flyawaysDermatologist co-developed, backed by science & stylist approvedA lemon and lime Citrus Zest scent that is fresh, bright & energeticBottle made from 50% recycled plasticsGluten-free, cruelty-free & veganFormulated WithoutSLS/SLES sulfatesSiliconesParabensItem 2581904How To UseDistribute through soaking wet curls.Scrunch upward for definition or smooth downward to tame.Do not rinse.Style as usual.If you have dry, fine curls, Wave Maker, a lightweight cream with a hydra-definition blend is recommended. If you have dry, coarse curls, DevaCurl recommends SuperCream, a multi-tasking ultra-rich cream with a hydra-definition blend.Keep out of the reach of children. In the event of contact with eyes, rinse thoroughly with water.IngredientsAqua/Water/Eau, Cetearyl Alcohol, Glycerin, Behentrimonium Chloride, Ppg-3 Benzyl Ether Myristate, Tapioca Starch, Laureth-4, Aminomethyl Propanol, Ceteareth-20, Cetrimonium Chloride, Citric Acid, Disodium Edta, Ethyl Macadamiate, Ethylhexylglycerin, Etidronic Acid, Hydroxypropyltrimonium Hydrolyzed Corn Starch, Isopropyl Alcohol, Malic Acid, Panthenol, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Tocopherol, Phenoxyethanol, Parfum/Fragrance, Hexyl Cinnamal, Limonene, Linalool.As is common in the hair care industry, from time to time DevaCurl may update certain ingredients, such as preservative systems or fragrance, to improve quality, enhance the performance of the product, or to comply with the latest regulatory requirements. You should always check the product's packaging for the most up to date and accurate ingredient information.DevaCurl products go through rigorous testing and adhere to all relevant cosmetics regulations for product safety before they reach the market.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Distribute through soaking wet curls.Scrunch upward for definition or smooth downward to tame.Do not rinse.Style as usual.If you have dry, fine curls, Wave Maker, a lightweight cream with a hydra-definition blend is recommended. If you have dry, coarse curls, DevaCurl recommends SuperCream, a multi-tasking ultra-rich cream with a hydra-definition blend.Keep out of the reach of children. In the event of contact with eyes, rinse thoroughly with water.
ingredients: Linalool.As is common in the hair care industry

reviews.headline: I would not buy again. My hair did not perform well.
reviews.comments: I am not happy with this product I will exchange it for something else.

reviews.headline: I would definitely recommend this product
reviews.comments: Since i am using this , my hair feels Fabolous

reviews.headline: I would buy this product again
reviews.comments: This product is light and does not make my curls feel crunchy or stiff.

reviews.headline: Love this!
reviews.comments: I was using DevaCurl Gel after washing my hair, but I have discovered DevaCurl Styling Cream and like it so much better.  It is lighter than the gel and I get better results for my curls.

reviews.headline: Love it!
reviews.comments: This works well to tame my fine, frizzy hair, without making it look greasy. It's one of the few products that are perfect for my hair.

reviews.headline: Bouncy curls
reviews.comments: I love this product. It makes my wavy hair curlier and bouncier. But the bottle design is terrible - the pump kept breaking apart and it's ridiculously hard to put back together. For that reason alone, I will probably not repurchase.

reviews.headline: Soft/med hold no crunch!
reviews.comments: This is one of my go-to's for curly hair. Gives my curls definition without the crunch! Product layer this with a leave in or hair oil. I get so many compliments when I use this product!

reviews.headline: Wonderful product!
reviews.comments: I love this styling cream. It REALLY helps define my curls, adds moisture and helps with definition. Does not weigh my hair down, and I love the smell.  I've been reading reviews about how people hate the new formula and the smell…well I'm not sure if I have the new or old formula.  I just bought a new one, haven't used it yet, but the packaging is the same as the one I'm currently using.  So I'm not sure about all of that.  I love this product and I definitely do not like being without it now!

reviews.headline: Bring Back the Old Formula & Bottle!
reviews.comments: This used to be my go-to styling cream for my very curly and frizzy hair. However, the new formula and new bottle are awful. Pump broke on my half-used bottle and there is no way to get it out. The new formula makes my hair sticky and unmanageable.

reviews.headline: Do not buy this product. Burned scalp.
reviews.comments: This product burned my scalp. That's all I'm going to say.

reviews.headline: Works great.  My semi curly hair now has big curl!
reviews.comments: Best styling cream I have ever used!  A must have for my hair products!

reviews.headline: Excellent product that does what it says
reviews.comments: I liked the original styling cream, couldn't be without it, but I like this more! Styles like the original, but leaves the hair softer. Looks like I made a new friend with this cream.

reviews.headline: Love this stuff
reviews.comments: In my opinion this is the best stuff for your curls

reviews.headline: Love this!
reviews.comments: This combined with the Ultra Defining Gel helps tame my curl and helps with frizz control

reviews.headline: Style cream
reviews.comments: This product is great and so easy to use!

reviews.headline: Best product ever for curls.
reviews.comments: This is a very nice product for my curls. It shapes very perfectly. I just love it. I would buy this over and over again.

reviews.headline: I continue to buy this product!
reviews.comments: I apply a small amount and scrunch my curls! Deva Curls leaves themselves soft yet holds the shape!

reviews.headline: Different formula (as of Summer 2022) - poor results
reviews.comments:
In Summer 2022 Devacurl changed their formula.  This one dries faster, and has less hold.  My hair looks frizzy right off the bat, using the same amount of product as I had used w/ the old formula.  
Will be returning.

reviews.headline: Back On Deva - the best for my curls
reviews.comments: Dropped these products like a hot potato after all the bad press years back, but decided to go back because I never experienced issues and literally nothing else works!! I'm so glad I did! This stuff tames my v frizzy curls and gives me the perfect amount of hold. Love love love (again). I don't like the new scent at all, but I can live with it.

reviews.headline: Great
reviews.comments: Been using this product since last summer and I absolutely love it. This is the main product that actually defines my curls and the other items in this like make my hair so soft

faceoff_positive.comments:
The DevaCurl Styling Cream is a true game-changer for those with curly or wavy hair. As someone who struggles with managing frizz and defining curls, this product has exceeded my expectations.

The first thing I noticed about this styling cream is its rich and creamy texture. It feels luxurious and spreads easily through damp hair, which makes application a breeze. Despite its thickness, the cream doesn't weigh down my curls or leave any greasy residue, which is a huge plus.

After using the DevaCurl Styling Cream and letting my hair air dry or diffusing it, I was amazed by the results. My curls looked more defined, bouncy, and frizz-free. This cream seems to work its magic by enhancing my natural curl pattern, creating soft, touchable curls that last throughout the day.

What sets this styling cream apart from others I've tried is its ability to provide both moisture and hold. It doesn't leave my hair feeling dry or stiff, but rather, it keeps it hydrated and adds a natural-looking hold that isn't overly rigid.

I also appreciate that this product is free from sulfates, parabens, and silicones, making it a healthier option for my hair. It's enriched with nourishing ingredients that promote hair health, which is essential for maintaining curls' integrity in the long run.

The scent of the DevaCurl Styling Cream is delightful, too – not overpowering but pleasantly fresh, leaving a subtle fragrance in my hair.

While this styling cream has been a game-changer for my curly hair, I would recommend users with finer or straight hair to use it sparingly, as it might be too heavy for their hair type.

All in all, the DevaCurl Styling Cream is a top-notch product for enhancing curls, combating frizz, and providing lasting hold without sacrificing hair health. If you have curly or wavy hair and are looking for a styling cream that truly delivers, this one is worth trying.
faceoff_positive.headline: Love it!

faceoff_negative.comments: I have been using this product for >10 years. They have "reformulated" and "rebranded" it many times during that period, but it has always been wonderful - NOT ANYMORE. Unfortunately, they decided to remove all of the lovely plant extracts (rosemary, hops, etc.) and replaced them with the standard chemicals found in cheaper products plus loads of awful perfume smell. Instead of a nice, light scent, it is an overpowering smell of old lady perfume. Completely awful. It was so strong that I had to take benadryl to clear my sinuses and after I washed my hair it still slightly smelled. Who wants that? I am so disappointed. The product still works very well, but it no longer has the light "lemon and lime zest" scent that they claim and the same ingredients I can get in a $4 product. I will no longer be using DevaCurl products.
faceoff_negative.headline: Changed ingredients - now smells like awful old lady perfume
